blue.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the blue channel.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

cold_white_color_temperature.docs:
**, float**: The coldest color temperature supported by this light. This is the lowest value when expressed in [mireds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mired), or the highest value when expressed in Kelvin.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

color_interlock.docs:
**, boolean**: When enabled, this will prevent white leds being on at the same time as RGB leds. See [Color Interlock](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbw.html#rgbw-color-interlock) for more information. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

color_temperature.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the color temperature channel.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

green.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the green channel.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

red.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the red channel.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

warm_white_color_temperature.docs:
**, float**: The warmest color temperature supported by this light. This is the highest value when expressed in [mireds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mired), or the lowest value when expressed in Kelvin.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*

white_brightness.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the brightness of the white leds.

*See also: [RGBCT Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgbct.html#configuration-variables)*
